医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明脉冲场消融治疗房颤患者的安全性由西奈山伊坎医学院领导的同类新技术的最大规模研究表明，脉冲场消融 (PFA) 对于治疗常见类型的心房颤动 (AF) 患者是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-shows-safety-of-pulsed-field-ablation-for-treating-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-shows-safety-of-pulsed-field-ablation-for-treating-病人-with-atrial-fibrillation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cb1bfc5-c304-4294-b34b-8d3ef4f722af Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:16:38 -0400 Study shows safety of pulsed field ablation for treating patients with atrial fibrillation
了解血小板-单核细胞相互作用以改善免疫疾病的治疗单核细胞是一种特殊类型的白细胞，分泌细胞因子作为炎症信使，这对于适当的免疫反应至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-platelet-mon Bathroom-interaction-to-improve-treatment-of-immune-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Understanding-the-platelet-monogenic-interaction-to-improve-treatment-of-immune-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d091c5ac-6495-49d0-bf4f-1d733a8a31b8 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 14:02:00 -0400 Understanding the platelet-monocyte interaction to improve treatment of immune disorders
昆士兰大学研究人员解开了细胞衰老的关键分子秘密昆士兰大学的研究人员解开了细胞衰老的关键分子秘密，这可能为随着人们衰老而提高生活质量铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/UQ-researchers-unlock-crucial-molecular-secrets-of-aging-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/UQ-researchers-unlock-crucial-molecular-secrets-of-aging-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acb550bd-f7a4-4d7f-ba6d-8d98f52a90a2 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 13:02:01 -0400 UQ researchers unlock crucial molecular secrets of aging in cells
产前接触大麻如何影响儿童心理健康科学家们正在试图了解当人们在子宫内接触大麻时，大麻如何影响长期神经发育。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/How-prenatal-cannabis-exposure-may-affect-mental-health-in-childhood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/How-prenatal-cannabis-exposure-may-affect-mental-health-in-childhood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5db5036e-ead4-4b79-89af-700684723ff1 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 12:58:10 -0400 How prenatal cannabis exposure may affect mental health in childhood
超越 BMI：肥胖诊断新框架优先考虑整体健康诊断和管理肥​​胖的系统不能再仅仅关注体重指数（BMI），这将许多本来可以从肥胖治疗中受益的人排除在外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Beyond-BMI-New-framework-for-obesity-diagnosis-prioritizes-overall-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Beyond-BMI-New-framework-for-obesity-diagnosis-prioritizes-overall-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e5d0c8e-3a58-4855-99f2-1c299b580276 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 12:47:37 -0400 Beyond BMI: New framework for obesity diagnosis prioritizes overall health
研究显示，接触细颗粒物会降低试管婴儿出生率今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上发表的一项开创性研究表明，在体外受精 (IVF) 过程中取出卵母细胞（卵子）之前接触细颗粒物 (PM) 会降低获得活体卵的几率出生率几乎下降了40%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Exposure-to-fine-pativity-matter-can-reduce-IVF-birth-rate-success-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Exposure-to-fine-pativity-matter-can-reduce-IVF-birth-rate-success-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fc9738c-660f-4dbc-a29c-014f27fdb8d5 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 12:38:17 -0400 Exposure to fine particulate matter can reduce IVF birth rate success, study reveals
凯斯西储大学获得 150 万美元资助用于预防 RP 患者失明的口服药物试验美国食品和药物管理局批准的治疗遗传性视网膜疾病的疗法只有一种，而数十种色素性视网膜炎 (RP) 基因尚无治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Case-Western-Reserve-University-receives-2415M-grant-for-oral-drug-trial-to-prevent-blindness-in-RP-患者。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Case-Western-Reserve-University-receives-2415M-grant-for-oral-drug-trial-to-prevent-blindness-in-RP-患者。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7473075-6b56-4248-a2a7-f44eb2ca8975 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 12:25:44 -0400 Case Western Reserve University receives $1.5M grant for oral drug trial to prevent blindness in RP patients
一流的口服药物可改善 IVF 中的胚胎着床和妊娠结局新的研究表明，一种一流的口服非激素药物可以有效提高接受体外受精 (IVF) 或胞浆内单精子注射 (ICSI) 的不孕女性的胚胎着床率、妊娠率和活产率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/First-in-class-oral-drug-improves-embryo-implantation-and-pregnancy-outcomes-in-IVF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/First-in-class-oral-drug-improves-embryo-implantation-and-pregnancy-outcomes-in-IVF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9feba334-b2db-496f-9c16-f29d088db0f9 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 10:22:55 -0400 First-in-class oral drug improves embryo implantation and pregnancy outcomes in IVF
植物源性物质有望对抗肺动脉高压从植物紫金牛中提取的物质与现有药物的作用方式不同。这样做是非常有效的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Plant-driven-substance-shows-promise-against-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Plant-driven-substance-shows-promise-against-pulmonary-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de234940-24ba-4b54-b2c7-9484670bd75b Mon, 08 Jul 2024 10:16:00 -0400 Plant-derived substance shows promise against pulmonary hypertension
新的“创可贴”测量通过汗液表明健康或疾病的身体生物标志物新加坡南洋理工大学（NTU Singapore）的科学家开发了一种“创可贴”或膏药，可以测量身体“生物标志物”，通过汗液表明健康或疾病，为患者提供一种新的非侵入性有效方法铺平了道路监测他们的健康状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-band-aid-measures-body-biomarkers-that-indicate-health-or-disease-through-sweat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/New-band-aid-measures-body-biomarkers-that-indicate-health-or-disease-through-sweat.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=56599393-3f97-4dbd-b9b3-5144a8b025e1 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 10:01:00 -0400 New 'band-aid' measures body biomarkers that indicate health or disease through sweat
